actions.name: Etherealness
actions.description: Shifts between Material and Ethereal Plane; visible on the other plane but can't affect or be affected from there.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.description: Creatures within 60 ft. that see the ghost make DC 13 WIS save or be frightened 1 minute; fail by 5+ also ages 1d4x10 years. Repeat save end of turns; immunity for 24 hours on success.

actions.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
actions.description: Humanoid within 5 ft. makes DC 13 CHA save or is possessed; ghost disappears, controls target, retains alignment/mental stats/immunities. Ends on body at 0 HP, ghost ends, or turned/forced out; target immune 24 hours after.
